title: PBE SIGN UP

embed.description: URF IS BACK!! Playing Zed On Urf Game Mode 0.6 Sec CD E 28-2 Ownage..Hes Too OP League of Legends!! "Like" if you want more & Click The BELL For Notifications!! →MOST TILTING 18-1-14 GAME EVER: http://bit.ly/2tTFWat →Subscribe For More!: http://full.sc/1gukNqq →My OVERWATCH Channel: http://bit.ly/1EAvIuW Follow me here!

body:
I was watching a video of Redmercy playing PBE and i checked MY pbe and it still says "pbe sign up is closed for maintenance.
why does it say that? and how long are you gonna let us w8.

replies.body:
Hey Kebi030,

That's correct, the PBE signups are currently closed. We don't have an ETA for when we'll be opening it up and allowing new applicants in at this time.

My first guess is that he recorded the video when the PBE wasn't down for maintenance, and happened to upload it when it was.
Are you sure it wasn't a stream?
